actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to extend the authority under the Emergency Petroleum Allocation Act of 1973.

summary.text: Amends the Emergency Petroleum Allocation Act of 1973 to extend the effective period of ceiling prices established by the President and applicable to any first sale of crude oil produced in the United States. Extends the President's authority under such Act to December 31, 1982.

titles.title: A bill to extend the authority under the Emergency Petroleum Allocation Act of 1973.
